channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics

item.title: CVE-2021-24829|2024-08-03T19:42:17.199Z -- unknown -- visitor%20traffic%20real%20time%20statistics
item.description: The Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics WordPress plugin before 3.9 does not validate and escape user input passed to the today_traffic_index AJAX action (available to any authenticated users) before using it in a SQL statement, leading to an SQL injection issue
